tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is so kind and helpful,I'm so happy with her treatment,  I even cNt imagine in short time duration she has procure me

*** *** ***** ********* ********* *** *** ******** We went for counseling regarding behavior and some great doubts regarding kids. She cleared all doubts and got us on right path regarding our son.

I would recommend her 100 percent. She is nice gynocologist and paed. Thanks

The doctor is very understanding and practical. Guided us right. Me and my wife are following her suggestion currently. Hopefully we will visit this doctor again with good news.we are very happy with the response so far. We got the reference from one of our close friend.

I am so happy with my doctor my health is very good so much improvement in my health very less medicine and i eat everything so i am very happy and i recommend she is amazing thanks for everything thanks
**** *********I visited for the first time...inspires confidence...calm, patient and reassuring...explained the situation well without alarming the patient.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words..

review: Dr. is very optimistic and very nice person, her from the heart advice is surely a must to hear.. *** ********* ** *****
She is more approachable and friendly. She is more patient and understanding than her husband. Made sure that I understood the prescription better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** *** *** ** * ******** ******* *** **** I returned the next day because the problem had aggravated, she refused to meet me and said that if there is any problem I can Whatsapp her only. Of course, I went to another doctor and got myself checked *** *********** **** *** ********* **** ** ******* *** ********** **** *** ***** *** * ****** **** **** ************ * *** ******** ** ********* **** *** ****** ****** * **** ** ****** * ****
She’s friendly and  gives a patient hearing to your issues and also explains the various aspects.  The clinical reports are also perused properly.
I know her from last 20 years....she is an awesome doctor and our family doctor too. Good consultant
